testcase.classname: To validate the forgot password functionality
testcase.name: To validate the forgot password with invalid mobilenumber
testcase.system-out: Given User should launch the chrome browser and load the facebook url.......passed When User should Click the forgot password link.............................passed And User should type the invalid mobile Number for D Map....................passed And User should click the search button.....................................passed Then user should navigate to password reset recover page....................passed
